PerfectNetExp.abs: (penetratingwound) ,指由尖锐的常为纤细的物体,如钉、餐桌上用的敲冰锥(icepick)等,穿入皮肤而致皮肤下位组织损伤,亦称刺伤(puncturewound) ;(4 )穿透伤(.

means.word_mean: 1. pick consisting of a steel rod with a sharp point; used for breaking up blocks of ice
